document.full_text: although sony said it did not know who was responsible for the attacks on the playstation network, it told a congressional subcommittee that a hacking group called anonymous played a role.
document.title: sony explains playstation attack to congress
lines_and_colors: although sony said it did not know who was responsible for the attacks on the playstation network, it told a congressional subcommittee that a hacking group called anonymous played a role.
